mapper.select: SELECT e.excno ,m.nick_name, m.name, TO_CHAR(e.EXC_AMOUNT, '9,999,999') EXC_AMOUNT, e.application_date, e.exc_status, e.approval_date FROM EXCHANGE E JOIN MEMBER M USING(MNO) ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT B.BNO, B.QUESTION_TYPE, M.NAME, B.BTITLE, B.WRITTEN_DATE, B.B_STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BWRITER = M.MNO) WHERE BTYPE LIKE 'QUESTION' AND B.REF_BNO IS NULL ORDER BY 6 DESC ,1 DESC

select.if: SELECT B.BNO, B.QUESTION_TYPE,B.BCONTENT, M.NAME, B.BTITLE, B.WRITTEN_DATE, B.B_STATUS ,BB.BCONTENT ANSWER FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BWRITER = M.MNO) JOIN BOARD BB ON(B.BNO = BB.REF_BNO) WHERE B.BTYPE LIKE 'QUESTION' AND B.BNO = #{bno}
SELECT B.BNO, B.QUESTION_TYPE,B.BCONTENT, M.NAME, B.BTITLE, B.WRITTEN_DATE, B.B_STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BWRITER = M.MNO) WHERE B.BTYPE LIKE 'QUESTION' AND B.BNO = #{bno}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD(BNO, BTITLE, BCONTENT, WRITTEN_DATE, BCOUNT, BTYPE, QUESTION_TYPE, REF_BNO, BWRITER, B_STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL, #{BTitle}, #{BContent}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT, 'QUESTION', #{qustionType}, #{bno}, 999, 7 )
mapper.select: SELECT M.MID,M.NAME, M.NICK_NAME, TO_CHAR(M.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') ENROLL_DATE, M.M_STATUS, bc.broad_address, RCOU.REPORT, BCOU.BROCOUNT FROM MEMBER M JOIN BROAD_CENTER BC ON(M.MNO = BC.MNO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MM.MNO ,COUNT(*) REPORT FROM MEMBER MM JOIN BOARD B ON(MM.MNO = B.REPORT_MNO) GROUP BY MM.MNO) RCOU ON(M.MNO = RCOU.MNO) LEFT JOIN (SELECT MMM.MID , COUNT(*) BROCOUNT FROM BROAD_CENTER BRC JOIN BROAD_HIS BH ON(BRC.BCNO = BH.BCNO) JOIN MEMBER MMM ON(MMM.MNO = BRC.MNO) GROUP BY MMM.MID) BCOU ON(M.MID = BCOU.MID) WHERE M.MID LIKE #{userId}
mapper.update:
UPDATE MEMBER
SET M_STATUS = 'N'
SET M_STATUS = 'Y'
WHERE MID LIKE #{mid}
mapper.select: SELECT B.BNO, B.BTITLE, B.REPORT_TYPE , M.MID WRITER ,MM.MID TARGET ,C.COU, B.WRITTEN_DATE, B.B_STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BWRITER = M.MNO) JOIN MEMBER MM ON(B.REPORT_MNO = MM.MNO) JOIN (SELECT REPORT_MNO, COUNT(*)COU FROM BOARD GROUP BY REPORT_MNO) C ON(C.REPORT_MNO = B.REPORT_MNO) WHERE BTYPE LIKE 'REPORT' ORDER BY 8,7 DESC

SELECT B.BTITLE , B.BCONTENT , B.WRITTEN_DATE , B.REPORT_TYPE, B.B_STATUS, M.MID WRITER ,MM.MID TARGET FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON(B.BWRITER = M.MNO) JOIN MEMBER MM ON(B.REPORT_MNO = MM.MNO) WHERE B.BNO = #{bno}
